item.title: Certified Calico Operator: Level1
item.author: Parth Goswami
item.description: In this article, I will share my experience in becoming a Certified Calico Operator: Level 1. Most of the information is available on the course portal and Calicoâ€™s webpages. I’ve made an effort to compile all the essential details about the course and exam in one location, and I hope it will be helpful to you. What is Project Calico? Project Calico is an open-source project with an active development and user community.
